name: Emoji Fill
description:
Fill this world with a smile! 🙂

Jump from your emoji to dead emojis and fill them with new emotions! 🤩
Just one touch is enough to play! 👆

Collect cash emojis to unlock new emotions. 🤑

Beware of obstacles that will stand in front of hitting the desired goal. 😱
So better aim and study the behavior of the level to achieve the desired goal. 🤔

Reach the highest score and become a legend of Emoji Fill! 🏆
